title: Statement from the Press Secretary on the Terrorist Attacks in Pakistan â€“ The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
June 25, 2017
The United States strongly condemns the terrorist attacks in Parachinar and Quetta on Friday.These attacks, which deliberately targeted civilians, and killed over 80 people, are a strong reminder of the threat posed throughout the region by the scourge of terrorism.We stand with the people of Pakistan in their fight against it.
